name: Death Elevator
description:
Journey to the top floor of this skill based game and kill waves of enemies as you uncover the mystery of the elevator.

- Fast movement
- Slow motion triggers everytime you are in danger
- Randomized rooms
- Randomized weapons
- Score system
- Interpretative plot

Attention, this game has:
- No upgrades
- No skill tree
- No progression system at all...

Reach the top floor or die trying!
